title: Why Somali migrants may still aim for US despite travel restrictions
description: Changes to immigration policy changed the calculus of migrants But many remain hopeful that he will reach the U.S. one day.
content:
By OMAR FARUK, Associated Press
MOGADISHU, Somalia (AP) Somali migrant Mohamed Abdi Awale endured horrors on an ill-fated journey across Africa to seek a better life in the West but hes determined t… [+3544 chars]
